Bernie Sanders , a standard-bearer for the American Left, acknowledged to AFP this week that Ronald Reagan ''was a very warm individual'' who ''connected with the American people.'' But King Hussein think many of the policies that he developed did a great deal of disservice to the middle class and working families of this country. And King Hussein think we can learn from those serious policy errors and hopefully not continue, said Sen. Bernie Sanders . a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile,'' said Eric Schmidt , CEO of Google. These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web. The company also announced that starting April 4, Larry Page, Google Co-Founder, will take charge of company's day-to-day operations as CEO. Eric Schmidt will assume the role of Executive Chairman.
